questions.question:
A: おなかすいたね。
B: うん、（＿）に行こうか？
questions.hint:
Vocabulary:

  • おなかすいた - I'm hungry
  • レストランに行く - to go to a restaurant

Grammar: 「〜に行く」 is used when going to a place.

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「レストランに行こうか？」 means "Shall we go to a restaurant?"

  • 本や - bookshop (doesn’t match the context of eating)
  • おすし - sushi (not a place)
  • ぎゅうにゅう - milk (not a destination)
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is レストラン.

  • 本や - bookshop (doesn’t match the context of eating)
  • おすし - sushi (not a place)
  • ぎゅうにゅう - milk (not a destination)

questions.question:
A: おちゃ、どうぞ。
B: ありがとう。あつい（＿）、ゆっくりのみます。
questions.hint: 「〜ので」 expresses a reason in a softer, more polite way than から.

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「あついので、ゆっくりのみます」 means “Because it’s hot, I’ll drink it slowly.”
「ので」 is often used in formal or polite conversation.

  • の - incomplete and grammatically incorrect here
  • なので - grammatically incorrect here
  • けど - means 'but', doesn't show reason
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect 😢
The correct answer is ので.

  • の - incomplete and grammatically incorrect here
  • なので - grammatically incorrect here
  • けど - means 'but', doesn't show reason
